ExCnt.EX: But with a lodestone compass which was er magnetic iron oxide hung up on the ship , you could actually then work out that you go straight across from there to there no problems . And it then made possible going by the shortest route . So magnetite is a very important iron oxide .
They had found that when a piece of magnetite was suspended from a thread it came to rest in a North-South direction .
The magnetite particles on the honeybee's abdomen may be responsible for the bee's sensitivity to the Earth's magnetic field .
